entries: You seek to join the Free Captains of the Shackles and have learned everything you need to know about sailing and bossing people around. Now you just need a crew and a ship.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Wisdom or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Intimidation} skill and the {@skill Lore||Sailing Lore} skill.
You gain the {@feat Group Coercion} skill feat.
